InitialFeedbackHistory:
07/07/2023
Please note that you used an older DMP template. For your future DMPs please use the Flemish standard DMP template that is now used by FWO, BOF, IOF and VLAIO. You can find this template in DMPonline.be and on the FWO website (www.fwo.be/en/the-fwo/research-policy/data-management-plan/).
Sharing: you can also consider using a repository such as KU Leuven RDR (www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr) for data preservation and sharing, access can be restricted here to protect the privacy of the participants, but this makes it easier for others to find your data, and you will get a DOI that makes you data citable, for more information see for more information see www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr and www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/guidance/data-sharing
